name: Bitwise Solutions
description:
Hello,
We are Bitwise Ventures. We make awesome websites, mobile apps, games, designs & more.
Established in 2010,  we are a SMALL - SMART - DYNAMIC organization based out of India. Technology and learning new things excite us and we have worked on .Net, Java, Android, iOS, Unity, Animations, PHP, IONIC, etc.
Our core areas of work are as below -
Web Development  - HMTL5, CSS3 & JS
Cross Platform App/2D Game Development using UNITY
Laravel Development
Other PHP development - core, WordPress, Yii, Joomla etc.
Despite being a very small team we have managed to work with some of the biggest clients. We owe this to:
the supreme quality of work
transparency with the client
very high commitment levels
We like to call ourselves web artisans. For us, programming is an art and each of our team member enjoys practicing this art, thoroughly. We work WITH the client and NOT FOR the client. We believe each piece of software is a solution, a vision, an aspiration. We strive to share the vision of the client.  We understand that software should have meaning, substance, and intelligence. It should be affordable but not cheap, fast but not resource hungry, smart but not complex.
Choose us because:
We communicate
We understand
Technology excites us
We are fast
We test
We launch
We are honest
We love learning
We keep things simple
We design, develop and deploy
READ MORE...
